Readme.Chapter: Export structured data from Lua in xml-form

Works as intended
Escaping Text properly
xml entities
xml namespaces
Indentation after textnodes that are terminated with a newline
There is no need to build xmlrep, since it can be used in source-form.
Copy xmlrep.lua to a directory on your Luapath. Consult LUA_PATH_5_4 or LUA_PATH environment variables or https://www.lua.org/manual/5.4/manual.html#pdf-package.path
